instruction: Add the basic HTML structure (DOCTYPE, html, head, body tags) with character set, viewport settings, title, and basic styling for centering the game canvas.
expected_outcome: The `index.html` file contains the basic HTML structure with meta tags and styling.

instruction: Add a div with the id `game-container` inside the body. This will be the parent element for the Phaser canvas.
expected_outcome: A div element with `id="game-container"` is present within the `body` of the HTML.

instruction: Include the Phaser library using a CDN link.
expected_outcome: A `<script>` tag with `src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/phaser/3.70.0/phaser.min.js"` is present in the `index.html` file, ideally before any other script tags.

instruction: Include the game's JavaScript files (sprites, scenes, and main.js) using `<script>` tags, ensuring they are loaded in the correct order: sprites, then scenes, then the main game logic (`main.js`).
expected_outcome: `<script>` tags for `Player.js`, `Enemy.js`, `Bullet.js`, `MainScene.js`, `UIScene.js`, `GameOverScene.js`, and `main.js` are present in the `index.html` file, in that specific order. They should be placed after the Phaser CDN script tag.

instruction: Place all `<script>` tags inside the `<body>` tag, typically at the end just before the closing `</body>` tag for optimal loading performance.
expected_outcome: All `<script>` tags are located within the `<body>` tag and placed before the closing `</body>` tag.
